name: apm_sa2_timeseries
title: For sale, for rent and sold data by SA2 01/01/1986 - 31/12/2017

abstract: This SA2 level, time series dataset describes for sale/for rent listings and sold data across Australia for the period 01/01/1986 ? 31/10/2017, with 12-month aggregations. For Sale/For Rent listings are available from 2003 for all states. APM sold data are available from: NSW, SA, QLD, ACT, WA since 1993, auction results in Sydney since 1989, VIC since 1985, NT since 1998 and TAS since 2003. Read the Data disclaimer for more information.

selectedAttributes.name: PropertyCategorisation
selectedAttributes.title: Property Categorisation
selectedAttributes.description: Category of property (Apartment House, Cottage, House, Patio House, Semi, Terrace, Townhouse, Villa, Villa House, Land, Duplex, Duplex Unit, Flat, Quadruplex, Studio, Triplex, Triplex Unit, Unit).

selectedAttributes.name: SA22011Code
selectedAttributes.title: SA2 Code (2011)
selectedAttributes.description: Official Government Reference unique ID assigned to each Statistical Area SA2-9 digit.

selectedAttributes.name: Sold_Both_Auction_Private_Treaty_AveragePrice
selectedAttributes.title: Average Price (Sold)
selectedAttributes.description: Sold - Both Auction & Private Treaty. Sum of total values divided by the number of values observed.

selectedAttributes.name: Sold_Both_Auction_Private_Treaty_MedianPrice
selectedAttributes.title: Median Price (Sold)
selectedAttributes.description: Sold - Both Auction & Private Treaty. Middle value in a range of values, 50th percentile rank of the data set, arranged from lowest to highest.
